skill.name: Morale Boost
skill.description: Markus grants nearby party members a boost of temporary health and staggers nearby enemies.

talents.name: Drillmaster
talents.description: Damaging multiple enemies in one swing grants temporary health based on the number of targets hit. Max 5 enemies.

talents.name: Mercenary's Pride
talents.description: Melee killing blows grants temporary health based on the health of the slain enemy.

talents.name: Captain's Command
talents.description: Healing yourself with a First Aid Kit or a Healing Draught also heals your nearby allies for 20% of their maximum health. Removes any wounds.

talents.name: The More The Merrier!
talents.description: Increases Power by 5% for every nearby enemy and stacks up to 5 times.

talents.name: Limb-Splitter
talents.description: Increases cleave power by 50%.

talents.description: Every 5 hit grants a guaranteed critical strike. Critical strikes can no longer occur randomly.

talents.name: Mainstay
talents.description: Deal 40% more damge to staggered enemies. Each hit against a staggered enemy adds another count of stagger. Bous damage is increase to 60% against enemies afflicted by more than one stagger effect.

talents.name: Smiter
talents.description:
The first enemy hit always counts as staggered.

Deal 20% more damage to staggered enemies. Each hit against a staggered enemy adds another count of stagger. Bonus damage is increased to 40% against enemies afflicted by more than one stagger effect.

talents.name: Enhanced Power
talents.description: Increases total Power Level by 7%. This is calculated before other buffs are applied.

The first enemy hit always counts as staggered.
